com.kallasoft.smugmug.api.util
Class APIUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.kallasoft.smugmug.api.util.APIUtils

public class APIUtils
extends Object

Class used to provide generally useful methods to the API regardless of version.

Author:
Riyad Kalla

Constructor Detail

APIUtils

public APIUtils()
Method Detail

isEmpty

public static boolean isEmpty(String text)
Convenience method used to test if a String is empty. A String is considered empty if it is null, of length 0, or once trimmed is of length 0.

This implementation is provided to remove the dependency on the Commons Lang library.

Parameters:
text - The String that will be tested to see if it's empty.
Returns:
true if text is null, of length 0 or trimmed then of length 0, otherwise returns false.

toString

public static String toString(Object object)
Convenience method used by method implementations to convert optional values to a String while returning a null value when the value passed in is null as opposed to throwing a NPE.

This makes writing the wrapper/convenience methods that eventually make a call to Method.execute(String, String[]) easier to implement.

Parameters:
object - The object that needs to be converted to a String.
Returns:
the String representation of the passed in Object (as represented by object#toString()) or null if the argument was null.

toString

public static String toString(Boolean bool)
Convenience method, similar to toString(Object) but customized for converting Boolean values to 0 or 1 for false or true respectively. SmugMug's API only accepts 0 or 1 for boolean values up until API version 1.2.2, when true/false were allowed.

However in order to maintain compatability across 1.2.0/1.2.1 and beyond, this conversion method is still employed to normalize all the values.

Parameters:
bool - The Boolean whose value will be converted to 0 or 1.
Returns:
if bool is null, returns null otherwise if bool is false returns 0 and if bool is true returns 1.

readStream

public static byte[] readStream(InputStream inputStream)
                         throws RuntimeException
Used to read the data from the given stream into a byte[].

This method does not close the given stream when reading is done; the caller should do that.

Parameters:
inputStream - The stream whose bytes will be returned as an array.
Returns:
a byte array that contains the data from the given stream.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an error occurs while trying to read the bytes from the stream (e.g. stream is already closed, no bytes, etc.).

base64Encode

public static String base64Encode(byte[] data)
                           throws RuntimeException
Used to Base64-encode a byte array.

Parameters:
data - An array of bytes that will be Base64-encoded.
Returns:
a String that represents the result of Base64-encoding the original array.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an error occurs while trying to Base64-encode the byte array.

calculateMD5Sum

public static String calculateMD5Sum(byte[] data)
                              throws RuntimeException
Used to calculate the MD5 Sum for the given array of bytes.

Parameters:
data - The byte array who's MD5 Sum will be calculated.
Returns:
a String representing the MD5 Sum for the contents of the given byte array.
Throws:
RuntimeException - if an error occurs while trying to calculate the MD5 Sum for the byte array.
